item.description:
Preliminary Agenda:

Hello everyone!

The Stop the Wars Coalition is meeting this evening at E5 (33 Harrison Ave. 5th Floor, Chinatown) at 6:30pm.

On today's agenda:

Reviewing the success of our Marx in Soho fundraiser. Proceeds will be calculated and given to the Treasurer.

PayPal - Nick Giannone has asked that we find someone else to manage the account.

Review of other recent local actions:
- Memorial Day action at Christopher Columbus Park
- Various Palestine Solidarity actions

Upcoming events:
- 6/12 New England United anti-war network meeting
- 6/12 War Criminals Andrew Card and John Yoo to visit Boston
- 6/22 thru 6/27 US Social Forum in Detroit, MI
- 7/23 thru 7/25 United National Antiwar Conference in Albany, NY

Topics for Discussion:
How should the antiwar movement respond to the ongoing crisis in Gaza? How is Boston organizing?
Who in Boston is responding to the call for a Honduras Solidarity Network?
item.name: Antiwar Meetup
